tool_description: Convert CSV or JSON data to fancy plain-text/markdown tables. Read the official docs at https://mkconvert.github.io
name: MkConvert
title: MkConvert

api_list.name: table
api_list.description: Generate fancy plain-text tables from CSV or JSON data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mkconvert.p.rapidapi.com/table"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mkconvert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
